Author: GitHub
Title: Is the future of software 'one size fits me'?
Description:
Tired of software that doesn't quite fit your workflow? In this clip from The GitHub Podcast, host Cassidy Williams argues that the future is "one size fits me." Learn how mature open source projects and AI tools are making it easier than ever to build custom software tailored to your exact needs.

#Software #DIY #AI
